metadata.title: CVE-2024-50084 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: microchip: vcap api: Fix memory leaks in vcap_api_encode_rule_test()Commit a3c1e45156ad ("net: microchip: vcap: Fix use-after-free error inkunit test") fixed the use-after-free error, but introduced belowmemory leaks by removing necessary vcap_free_rule(), add it to fix it.	unreferenced object 0xffffff80ca58b700 (size 192):	  comm "kunit_try_catch", pid 1215, jiffies 4294898264	  hex dump (first 32 bytes):	    00 12 7a 00 05 00 00 00 0a 00 00 00 64 00 00 00  ..z.........d...	    00 00 00 00 criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-aws package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gke package in noble is affected and needs fixing.

linux-intel package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
